title: Calories in Menchie's Frozen Yogurt
meta_description: Discover calories in frozen yogurt Menchies, including nutrition per 100g serving, macros, and tips for flavors and toppings under 160 characters.
assumptions: Average plain, non-fat frozen yogurt from Menchie's; self-serve style, no toppings; values based on standard nutritional info.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, fat content, brand specifics, portion size, and added mix-ins. Check Menchie's app or labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100g of Menchie's frozen yogurt contains about 124 kcal and 4g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a typical Menchie's frozen yogurt serving?
faqs.a: About 124 kcal per 100g for plain non-fat; a 4oz (113g) scoop is roughly 140 kcal.

faqs.q: What are the macros for Menchie's frozen yogurt?
faqs.a: Per 100g: 24g carbs (20g sugars), 4g protein, 1g fat; mostly from milk and sweeteners.

faqs.q: Does Menchie's frozen yogurt have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Non-fat versions have ~1g fat and 5mg cholesterol per 100g; full-fat flavors increase both.

faqs.q: How do toppings affect calories in frozen yogurt Menchies?
faqs.a: Toppings like candy or nuts can add 50-100+ kcal per serving; fruits add fewer (10-30 kcal).

faqs.q: Are Menchie's frozen yogurts low-sugar options available?
faqs.a: Yes, sugar-free flavors have ~20 fewer kcal per 100g, with reduced sugars to under 5g.
